text: The Skirmish at Abbeville was a battle fought between the Union Army and the Confederate Army in Lafayette County, Mississippi on August 23, 1864. The battle resulted in a Union victory ==References== https://www.nytimes.com/1864/09/10/news/gen-aj-smith-s-expedition-the- movement-into-mississippi.html Abbeville Abbeville Category:Conflicts in 1864 Category:1864 in Mississippi Category:August 1864 events Category:Lafayette County, Mississippi
title: Skirmish at Abbeville
